reference.title: Hosts page
reference.shortdesc: The Hosts page displays information about the individual hosts that are included in all resource pools that employs.

section.p: The Hosts table lists each machine that is assigned to a resource pool. Summary information about each host includes whether it is active, its resource pool, memory, RAM limit and usage for the Docker containers, CPU cores, kernel version, and the version of that the host is running, and actions that you can perform on the host.

note.ph: The memory values in the hosts table on the Hosts page differ from those in the Memory Usage graph on the host details page. The table shows memory usage for the Docker containers only. The graph shows total system memory usage for Docker containers and all services that are running on the system.

section.p: You can search for, add, and delete hosts. To display details about a host, click the host name.
